Devianne:
The gates can be kept open briefly with the help of magic. That's what I'm doing.
It is impossible to fix the gates for a long time, and I can't take a single step, I keep them. Also, if Bernstein finds out, there will be big problems. As soon as I feel that he is going into the fortress, I am forced to drop everything and hide. But Bernstein, whom we want to destroy, is very dangerous.
